content: @Kartik kumar @LordOfBikes I noticed you ran out of all 60 of your "Install and Run" LibreCAD tasks, so I bumped it up to 100. Pretty sure that's why the flurry of reviews slowed... Let me know if you want me to bump it back down.

@Sean , I set "Install and Run LibreCAD V2" back to 60 again. I reduced it recently, because we don't really have follow up tasks for this one. The issue arose that many students used V2 to do the V3 GUI test tasks.
When they do the "Build from source" V2/V3 tasks instead, they can continue with coding tasks.
Oh, alright, very good then. Sorry for the distraction!.
